SEARCH
Package factory

Class ChatBotSimulationTestGrading

java.lang.Object
factory.ChatBotSimulationTestGrading
All Implemented Interfaces:
TestGrading
public class ChatBotSimulationTestGrading extends Object implements TestGrading
Implementation of the TestGrading interface that facilitates the grading of student-written Java tests using JUnit 5.

This class uses a factory design pattern and observes the test execution process, notifying registered observers about the test results and storing the test outcomes.

Key Features:

  • Executes JUnit 5 tests based on a provided Java file.
  • Notifies observers of test results.
  • Stores results in a shared grading observer manager.

For more information on the Factory Method pattern, see Factory Method.

For details about JUnit 5, refer to the JUnit 5 User Guide.

Author:
jalenearmstrong

    • runTests

      public void runTests(File javaFile)
      Executes the JUnit 5 tests contained in the specified Java file.

      The method discovers and runs tests defined in the file, marking each test as passed or failed and notifying observers of the results.

      Specified by:
      runTests in interface TestGrading
      Parameters:
      javaFile - the Java source file containing the test definitions.
